alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 3:02PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Twin Falls, Jerome, southeastern Elmore, eastern Owyhee, Gooding and southern Camas Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 302 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of White Arrow Hot Spring to near Winter Spring. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Twin Falls, Kimberly, Timber Butte and Magic Valley Regional Airport around 310 PM MDT. Jerome, Hansen, Eden and Flat Top Butte around 320 PM MDT. Hazelton, Magic Reservoir, Murtaugh and Milner Dam around 330 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
